rules_text:
Create two 3/3 red Spawn creature tokens.
Flashback–{2}{R}, Sacrifice a creature. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Sanctuary's beasts are among the few bioforms that can survive Leygrid mana. But even they are far from unchanged by it.[/i]
